skills.name: Error vs Exception
skills.pattern: Error: unrecoverable. Exception: recoverable. (varies by language)

skills.name: Fail Fast
skills.pattern: Validate input immediately, fail before side effects

skills.name: Graceful Degradation
skills.pattern: Feature fails but app continues, fallback behavior

skills.name: try/catch/finally
skills.pattern: try { risky(); } catch (e) { handle(e); } finally { cleanup(); }

skills.name: Custom Errors
skills.pattern: class ValidationError extends Error { constructor(msg) { super(msg); } }

skills.name: Error Cause
skills.pattern: new Error('Failed', { cause: originalError }); e.cause

skills.name: Promise Rejection
skills.pattern: promise.catch(handleError); async/await with try/catch

skills.name: Unhandled Rejection
skills.pattern: process.on('unhandledRejection', handler); window.onunhandledrejection

skills.name: Result Type
skills.pattern: type Result<T,E> = {ok: true, value: T} | {ok: false, error: E}

skills.name: Either Monad
skills.pattern: Either<Error, Success> - chain operations, handle error at end

skills.name: Option/Maybe
skills.pattern: Option<T> = Some(T) | None - explicit absence handling

skills.name: Railway Oriented
skills.pattern: Happy path rail, error rail - switch on failure

skills.name: Error Codes
skills.pattern: {code: 'USER_NOT_FOUND', message: '...', details: {...}}

skills.name: Error Boundaries
skills.pattern: componentDidCatch, getDerivedStateFromError - catch render errors

skills.name: HTTP Error Responses
skills.pattern: 4xx client errors, 5xx server errors, consistent error format

skills.name: Problem Details
skills.pattern: {type, title, status, detail, instance} standard format

skills.name: GraphQL Errors
skills.pattern: errors array, extensions for details, partial data + errors

skills.name: Input Validation
skills.pattern: Validate at boundaries, whitelist approach, sanitize output

skills.name: Schema Validation
skills.pattern: Zod, Joi, Yup - validate shape, provide detailed errors

skills.name: Validation Messages
skills.pattern: Field-level errors, actionable messages, i18n support

skills.name: Error Logging
skills.pattern: Stack trace, context, user info, request details

skills.name: Error Tracking
skills.pattern: Sentry, Bugsnag, Rollbar - aggregate, alert, triage

skills.name: Breadcrumbs
skills.pattern: Trail of events leading to error, helps debugging

skills.name: Retry Logic
skills.pattern: Exponential backoff, max retries, jitter

skills.name: Idempotency
skills.pattern: Same request = same result, idempotency keys

skills.name: Circuit Breaker
skills.pattern: Open after failures, half-open to test, close on success

skills.name: Fallback Values
skills.pattern: cache ?? fetchData().catch(() => defaultValue)

skills.name: Timeout Handling
skills.pattern: Promise.race([fetch, timeout]), AbortController

skills.name: Error Testing
skills.pattern: expect(() => fn()).toThrow(); test error scenarios

skills.name: User Error Messages
skills.pattern: Clear, actionable, non-technical, recovery options
